document.full_text: mr. fitzgerald was prime minister in ireland from 1981 to 1987 during a time of severe economic crisis and served as an early architect of peace in northern ireland.
document.title: garret fitzgerald, ex-irish premier, dies at 85
lines_and_colors: mr. fitzgerald was prime minister in ireland from 1981 to 1987 during a time of severe economic crisis and served as an early architect of peace in northern ireland.
